_1.title: Search for financing
_1.text: The search for funding and contributions is an important step in the realization of a project where the collaboration of partners is called for. Their contribution can be financial and take the form of grants, donations or sponsorships. It can also be done through a contribution in goods and services, such as the loan of equipment, the participation of experts, and various analysis services.

des._1: The search for funding and contributions is an important step in the realization of a project where the collaboration of partners is called upon. Their contribution can be financial and take the form of grants, donations or sponsorships. It can also be done through a contribution in goods and services, such as the loan of equipment, the participation of experts, various analysis services.
des._2: In its approach, IP INVESTMENT S.A. considers, in addition to traditional financing (banking, fundraising, requests to financial institutions, etc.), less conventional or alternative financing; like tontines.
des._3: Tontines have the potential to become one of the main sources of funding for projects. It suffices to redefine certain structural and organizational aspects of this popular concept to adapt it to the business world.
des._4: Our goal is to enable entrepreneurs from different regions, parts of the continent and the world to be able to self-finance their projects by supporting each other.

_2.title: Investment and implementation assistance
_2.text: Cameroon is a country with enormous investment opportunities. IP INVESTMENT S.A. accompanies companies, especially VSEs and SMEs, which are generally disadvantaged in the search for investment opportunities.

des._1: Cameroon is a country offering enormous investment opportunities. IP INVESTMENT S.A. supports companies, in particular very small businesses and SMEs, which are generally disadvantaged in the search for investment opportunities.
des._2: IP INVESTMENT S.A. supports the investor in one or more phases of his establishment process: evaluation or identification of the project idea, choice of the location of the establishment site, preparation of the business plan, constitution of the company, establishment and launch of the activity, extension and development of the company etc ...
des._3: Taking into account the many uncertainties of our economic and socio-political environment likely to impact success, IP INVESTMENT S.A. strives to minimize the effects through a methodology that allows to quantify the foreseeable activity, to measure the necessary resources and finally bring together the means to be implemented.
des._4: Also, having a perfect knowledge of the realities of the business environment in Cameroon, we deploy the necessary resources to identify and define the needs of companies in order to promptly provide effective solutions oriented "efficiency and value added ".

_3.title: Investment strategy
_3.text: This service is mainly aimed at company managers where IP INVESTMENT S.A. assists them in the development of their business model, with the objective of capitalizing on the company's advantages in order to identify areas for growth and competitiveness.

des._1: This service is mainly intended for business leaders where IP INVESTMENT S.A. supports them in the development of their business model, with the objective of capitalizing on the advantages of the company to identify areas of growth and competitiveness. client, among others.
des._2: Beyond this advisory function, we also deploy an operational component through the performance of audits and benchmarks, market analysis, ownership of the internal and external environment, identification of issues and the implementation of scenarios that will respond to them.

_4.title: Heritage engineering
_4.text: IP INVESTMENT S.A. offers this service to individuals and companies to help them make informed decisions regarding all the important choices related to an investment project or a life project.

des._1: IP INVESTMENT S.A. offers this service to individuals and companies to facilitate them in making informed decisions. Regarding all the important choices related to an investment project or a life project. We thus provide balance sheets precise and detailed financial situation, propose adjustments according to the changing needs of the customer.
des._2: To this end, we first carry out a patrimonial diagnosis essential to define the expectations, needs, constraints and brakes of the commissioning entity. This diagnosis makes it possible to prioritize and define with him the most suitable strategy to an optimal management of its assets.
des._3: We also intervene in the fields of:

list._3: Support during the buyout or sale of a business;
list._4: Legal support: preparation of the marriage contract, divorce;

_5.title: Linking up
_5.text: Through its platform, IP INVESTMENT S.A. offers a real flow zone between the offer of project holders and the demand of potential investors

des._1: Through its platform, IP INVESTMENT S.A. offers a real zone of flow between the supply of project promoters and the demand of potential investors.
des._2: The objective here is to connect companies with companies, companies with individuals or individuals with individuals so that they can find and / or make profitable the product or the service which they need .
des._3: This dematerialization of supply and demand will encourage the meeting between natural and legal persons who had, until then, nothing in common.
des._4: The principle is simple: when you have an offer to propose, you publish it on the IP INVESTMENT S.A. platform so that it is visible to your potential future business partners; and if you are looking for of an offer, you have the possibility of consulting those present and comparing them with each other in order to make the choice that best meets your expectations.

_6.title: Project management and follow-up
_6.text: Our mission is to enable project leaders, civil society organizations, public and private institutions to have access to our expertise at any time.

des._1: Our mission is to enable project leaders, civil society organizations, public and private institutions (town halls, bilateral and multilateral donors, international projects based in Africa, non-governmental organizations) to be able to use at any time to our expertise.
des._2: To do this, we provide support within the non-exhaustive framework of:

list._1: The design, and implementation, monitoring-evaluation and financial analysis of projects;
list._4: The preparation of the action and development plan;

_7.title: Investment Consulting
_7.text: You want to invest capital in a financial, real estate or business project? IP INVESTMENT S.A. is the right advisor for you.

des.title: Do you want to invest capital in a financial, real estate or business project? IP INVESTMENT S.A. is the advisor you need:

_1.title: Financial investment advice
_1.text: Our challenge here is to recommend the financial investment best suited to your projects and objectives. Thus, we select for you the funds making the best profits.

_2.title: Real estate investment advice
_2.text: Thanks to a strong network of real estate developers, our offer is perfectly suited to your expectations, thus ensuring a minimum of profitability.

_3.title: Investment advice in business projects
_3.text: Our role is to advocate for investment in high potential business projects that are better suited and therefore more profitable.

partner.title: Our partners
partner.text: IP INVESTMENT S.A. makes sure to offer you the best possible support in your projects, and thus surrounds itself with quality partners who have a mastery of the economic environment. This network of partners is intended to grow in order to best meet your expectations.

about.header: The right pan-African platform for your investments and the management of your projects
about.text: Africa in general and Cameroon in particular have become over time, and even more so in the last three decades, spaces conducive to investments of all kinds. IP INVESTMENT S.A. is now positioned in Cameroon as the advisor par excellence in this process of capturing opportunities to capitalize. Thanks to the dynamism and expertise of our specialists, our perfect knowledge of the economic environment, and our network of partners, particularly in Cote d'Ivoire and Rwanda, we spare no effort in meeting your various needs in terms of investment, support, diagnosis, monitoring, management and implementation.

banner.title: Your best business partner
banner.sub_title: Choosing to work with IP INVESTMENT S.A. means opting for effective and efficient collaboration, because:

des_1._1: We have access through our various partners to a regularly updated database of potential project leaders as well as the realities and opportunities available in Cameroon, Rwanda and Cote d'Ivoire;
des_1._2: Presence in the 10 regions through its network and its partnerships with professional organizations, SMEs, etc.

des_2._1: In an increasingly urgent concern for the dematerialization of services, we have a Web platform and a mobile application (Apple and PlayStore) to facilitate real-time exchanges between investors, project leaders, partners and consultants of IP INVESTMENT S.A.;
des_2._2: Finally, we guarantee you 360° support for the realization of your various projects.
